001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.AffineTransformation;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
008
009@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
010public class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number> extends AffineTransformation<N> implements LinearModel<N>, UnaryEstimationFunction<N> {
011
012    private final FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor;
013
014    private static void ensureValidM(int m) {
015        if (m < 0) {
016            throw new IllegalArgumentException("M must be >= 0!");
017        }
018    }
019
020    public static <N extends Number> LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> create(int m, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
021        ensureValidM(m);
022        return new LinearBasisFunctionModel<>(m, basisFunctionGenerator);
023    }
024
025    protected LinearBasisFunctionModel(int modelComplexity, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
026        this(basisFunctionGenerator.generate(modelComplexity), basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType().zero(), basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(modelComplexity), basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType());
027    }
028
029    private LinearBasisFunctionModel(FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor, N bias, N[] weights, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
030        super(bias, weights, typeSupport);
031        this.featureExtractor = featureExtractor;
032    }
033
034    public FeatureExtractor<N> getFeatureExtractor() {
035        return featureExtractor;
036    }
037
038    public int getModelComplexity() {
039        return arity();
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public N estimateUnary(N input) {
044        N[] features = featureExtractor.extractFeatures(input);
045        return super.estimateScalar(features);
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public N estimateScalar(N[] inputs) {
050        if (inputs.length != 1) {
051            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid arity!");
052        }
053        return estimateUnary(inputs[0]);
054    }
055
056}
